TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content:
the capsule did not take fuel from the trunk for the liquid engines? If so you need to take fuel lines from the heat shield down to the Trunk. This will make it use trunk Fuel.

As for the RCS fuel I have solved this problem and It will be fixed in the next update. The fix makes things a little more annoying but a special part should fix any problems.

i was going to make the Trunk cargo (decoupler) rack and such tonight but I have been invited to a girls house for dinner. so i think i would much prefer that. ttyl.

oh and hey thanks for the pictures. if you care to give any feed back on engine power, fuel ammounts, and that would be cool.

Currently what i need most is heat rates and such if anyone cares to help. I want the 2nd stage and capsule engines to not be used in lowr atmosphere. Of course capsule engines should over heat is on full power only. Not in the landing power (which is like 25% for gravity defeating and alittle higher for slowing down)
Finished Trunk Tank redesign. I make them stackable. and well.. I think that about seals the deal. persistent Class ship parts will be next on my list.
That would make for a massive fireworks display.
spoot you post alot. doyou flay Failcans?

Why can\'t I open the .craft files??

I am really sure that I downloaded all the parts in the part folder. and I have putted the .craft files in the ship folder!! but why can\'t I load the falcon rocket in the game??

someone help me with my problem, I really want to fly to the mun with the falcon

spoot you post alot. doyou flay Failcans?

I have a few screens of the current release showing the orbital stage in flight and returning to the surface, but I\'m waiting for my account bandwidth to be restored so I can upload them. I can get more screens with future release as well. But no, I treat what I fly well.

Why can\'t I open the .craft files??

I am really sure that I downloaded all the parts in the part folder. and I have putted the .craft files in the ship folder!! but why can\'t I load the falcon rocket in the game??

someone help me with my problem, I really want to fly to the mun with the falcon

TMI requires the failcan27 (heavy) but it gets there easily enough. Regular failcan probably can get there but not have any retro burn fuel left lol.

as for why it cannot open I have no idea. doing something wrong?

TMI requires the failcan27 (heavy) but it gets there easily enough. Regular failcan probably can get there but not have any retro burn fuel left lol.

as for why it cannot open I have no idea. doing something wrong?

Thanks, I don\'t know what I did wrong but I redownloaded the file and now I have the failcon!

And your right. You can\'t launch a failcon the the mun.

Oow and a question, are you working on a dragon capsule??

That would be nice
There is one. It\'s the Durgun capsule.
oooo. I do so love that orbital vehicle. Very nice work you got here!

Has anyone attempted powered landings yet? This is the area I need feed back in if you wish to attempt there is a video showing it being done. remember,. ASAS off till aligned with surface

Oow and a question, are you working on a dragon capsule??

That would be nice

Did you read the opening post at all? -head scratching-

as for the mun. No it was not made to get there. it is a LKO or KEO. The Heavy on the other hand can get you wherever you need to go.
Testing my Female Decoupler for the docking ring. It seems ASAS account for nothing on top of them. so it wiggles a bit but it gets there. Hit a mountain on the way home but the crew lived

the capsule did not take fuel from the trunk for the liquid engines? If so you need to take fuel lines from the heat shield down to the Trunk. This will make it use trunk Fuel.

I tryed pretty hard to connect the heatshield with the trunk but i was unable to make it stick there.. it\'s like the heatshield is 'larger' then the trunk and it always end up connecting to itself.. any idea?

why not just load up the .craft i have provided? or load up the craft and have a look at how it si done.

you place it on the bottom pouter most rim of the front and back of the heatshield (bi symmetry mode) and then try and try and attach the other side to the outside of the trunk.

Testing my Female Decoupler for the docking ring. It seems ASAS account for nothing on top of them. so it wiggles a bit but it gets there. Hit a mountain on the way home but the crew lived

Isn\'t the Dragon docking mechanism (the Common Berthing Mechanism) androgynous?

Isn\'t the Dragon docking mechanism (the Common Berthing Mechanism) androgynous?

The crewed version uses the the NASA Docking System, which is androgynous. The cargo version uses the common berthing mechanism, which is non-androgynous.

Don\'t really care to much about realizum.

but it si alittle hard to make passive and active NDS things with out animations or the docking abiltiy at all. and at that conclusion. i think you are correct. i should wait to model this stuff

In lue of not beign able to see how docking works it is pointless to make docking parts so i will be taking a break. I will texture thy new stuff and get the next release out ASAP and then say bye bye for a bit I recon.
the craft files don\'t work at all

First off, thanks for using my mod

Secondly, sir. if you look at the craft files you will clearly see strut connectors keeping basically everything on the rocket together. Don\'t bash something you have not properly reenforced.

If I not my fault links don\'t work well in this game. and in the Opening Post you can clearly see them working perfectly as boosters, but with strut connectors.
Yeah, I\'ve noticed the struts, as well, and tried again with struts. Same result. It merely lasted 4 seconds longer before the struts exploded.

are you using my struts or the stock ones?

They work perfectly fine as boosters........
I was going to make this lovely thing but Then i saw KW was going to have a shuttle as well. So eh
